solution_line_template: Since they are paid ${pay_per_hour} each per hour of work and can complete a job in one hour, they earn a total of ${pay_per_hour}*{num_men}=$<<{pay_per_hour}*{num_men}={total_per_hour}>>{total_per_hour} together for an hour of work.
If they earn together ${total_per_hour} for one job, for the five jobs, they'll earn ${total_per_hour}*{num_jobs}=$<<{total_per_hour}*{num_jobs}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}
